dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5470 IH: To repeal the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Budd (for himself and Mr. Mooney of West Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To repeal the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes.

section.header: Repeal of the Office of Financial Research

subsection.text: Subtitle B of title I of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (12 U.S.C. 5342) is hereby repealed.

subsection.header: Conforming amendments to the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
subsection.text: The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (12 U.S.C. 5301 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the table of contents in section 1(b), by striking the items relating to subtitle B of title I;

subparagraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (6) and (7) as paragraphs (5) and (6), respectively;

clause.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (B) through (E) as subparagraphs (A) through (D), respectively; and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (c)(1), by striking subparagraphs (C), (D), and (E) and inserting subparagraphs (B), (C), and (D);

clause.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking direct the Office of Financial Research to;
by redesignating subparagraphs (C) through (N) as subparagraphs (B) through (M), respectively; and
in paragraph (1), by striking the Office of Financial Research, member agencies, and and inserting member agencies and;
in paragraph (2), by striking the Office of Financial Research, any member agency, and and inserting any member agency and;

subclause.text: by striking , acting through the Office of Financial Research, each place such term appears; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking the Office of Financial Research or; and

clause.text: in paragraph (5)(A), by striking , the Office of Financial Research,;

paragraph.text: in section 116, by striking , acting through the Office of Financial Research, each place such term appears; and
by amending section 118 to read as follows:

section.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to the Council $4,000,000 for fiscal year 2018 and each fiscal year thereafter to carry out the duties of the Council.

paragraph.header: Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989
paragraph.text: Section 1206(a) of the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989 (12 U.S.C. 1833b(a)) is amended by striking the Office of Financial Research,.
Title 5, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in section 3132(a)(1)(D), by striking the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, and the Office of Financial Research and inserting and the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection; and
in section 5314, by striking Director of the Office of Financial Research..

paragraph.text: Section 3502(5) of title 44, United States Code, is amended by striking the Office of Financial Research,.
